languages.text: "Кар... каркина, шерин" {n}, — выплевывает Джай и жмурится так, словно само слово может ее поранить.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Кар... каркина, шерин" {n}, — выплевывает Джай и жмурится так, словно само слово может ее поранить.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "It is the carc— the carcina, shereen." {n}Jae spits out the word and shuts her eyes tight as if the word itself could hurt her.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Кар... каркина, шерин" {n}, — выплевывает Джай и жмурится так, словно само слово может ее поранить.{/n}

languages.text: 「それはカル…カルシナよ、シャリーン」{n}ジェイはその言葉を吐き出すと、まるでその言葉そのものが自分を傷つけるかのように、目を固く閉じた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is the carc— the carcina, shereen." {n}Jae spits out the word and shuts her eyes tight as if the word itself could hurt her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それはカル…カルシナよ、シャリーン」{n}ジェイはその言葉を吐き出すと、まるでその言葉そのものが自分を傷つけるかのように、目を固く閉じた。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “是……是因为肺癌，亲爱的。”{n}婕伊吐出了这个词，紧紧地闭上了眼睛，仿佛这个词本身就会伤害到她。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is the carc— the carcina, shereen." {n}Jae spits out the word and shuts her eyes tight as if the word itself could hurt her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “是……是因为肺癌，亲爱的。”{n}婕伊吐出了这个词，紧紧地闭上了眼睛，仿佛这个词本身就会伤害到她。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Es la car... la carcina, shereen». {n}Jae escupe la palabra y cierra los ojos con fuerza, como si la propia palabra pudiera herirla.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is the carc— the carcina, shereen." {n}Jae spits out the word and shuts her eyes tight as if the word itself could hurt her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Es la car... la carcina, shereen». {n}Jae escupe la palabra y cierra los ojos con fuerza, como si la propia palabra pudiera herirla.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Es ist das Car ... das Carcina, Shereen." {n} Jae spuckt das Wort aus und presst die Augen fest zusammen, als könnte das Wort selbst ihr wehtun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is the carc— the carcina, shereen." {n}Jae spits out the word and shuts her eyes tight as if the word itself could hurt her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es ist das Car ... das Carcina, Shereen." {n} Jae spuckt das Wort aus und presst die Augen fest zusammen, als könnte das Wort selbst ihr wehtun.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « C'est le car... le carcina, shereen, » {n}crache Jae en fermant les yeux, comme si le mot lui-même était dangereux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is the carc— the carcina, shereen." {n}Jae spits out the word and shuts her eyes tight as if the word itself could hurt her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est le car... le carcina, shereen, » {n}crache Jae en fermant les yeux, comme si le mot lui-même était dangereux.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Kan... Kanserden şirinim." {n}Kelimelerin ağzından çıkmasıyla Jae, sanki bunu telaffuz etmek bile ona acı veriyormuş gibi gözlerini yumuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is the carc— the carcina, shereen." {n}Jae spits out the word and shuts her eyes tight as if the word itself could hurt her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kan... Kanserden şirinim." {n}Jae, kelimeyi söylemesiyle birlikte sanki onu duymak bile acı çektiriyormuş gibi gözlerini sıkıca kapatıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
